title: TAIE International Institute: Landing Page Project

about.name: TAIE International Institute
about.desc: TAIE International Institute is a leading international school in Toronto, Canada, offering a university preparation program called Unibridge, which acts as a pathway to prestigious universities worldwide.

projectTeam.desc: The team consisted of 2 product designers and a UX researcher, who collaborated for 2 weeks to design and develop the landing page using Framer.

problem.desc: Create a comprehensive landing page for TAIE International Institute highlighting their Unibridge program, effectively communicating benefits, showcasing success stories, and driving engagement with multiple CTAs.

goals.title: Highlight Program Benefits
goals.desc: Effectively showcase the benefits and success rates of the Unibridge program.

goals.title: Drive Engagement
goals.desc: Provide clear pathways for users to get in touch, learn more, and enroll.

goals.title: Build Credibility
goals.desc: Incorporate testimonials and success stories to enhance trust.

goals.title: Provide Detailed Information
goals.desc: Present detailed information about TAIE International Institute and their offerings.

solution.desc: Developed an intuitive landing page with clear navigation, compelling visuals and testimonials, detailed program information, and optimized lead capture forms.

discoveryPhase.targetAudience: Students aged 16-25 preparing for top universities worldwide.
discoveryPhase.inspiration: Analyzed competitor landing pages and client references to design a professional yet engaging look.
discoveryPhase.ideation: Multiple iterations of hero sections and layouts were created and refined based on client feedback.

uiAndVisuals.approach: Designed a clean and modern interface with a balanced use of white space and bold accent colors.
uiAndVisuals.colors: Deep blues and subtle whites with accent colors for CTAs and key sections.
uiAndVisuals.typography: Instrument Sans was chosen for its modern aesthetic and readability.

achievements: Enhanced user engagement through a professional and user-friendly interface.
Successfully highlighted program benefits and credibility through data-driven visuals.
Optimized for lead generation and enrollment conversions.

clientFeedback.summary: Client expressed satisfaction with the clean design and intuitive user experience, noting the positive impact on engagement and enrollment inquiries.
